text: Finally released in the west! Praise be
author: boyblob

text: Best Action RPG ever made. Period. Not only that, but this game wins the award for most replayable game of all time, as well. Six characters to choose from, each with their own story line, six total classes per character, three total party members, each with their own roles (depending on who is in what role can change the dialogue, and even the story in some ways). You could play this game 6,435 times (if my math is correct (which it probably isn't)), each time having a completely different experience. I can't think of another game like this that even comes close to its greatness.

text:
@SupraDarky 
I own a near mint copy of this game and I have replayed this game so many times I can't remember how many times I played it. As you said, game has amazing replay value coupled with one of the most amazing soundtracks ever to grace the SNES, so this definitely goes into my top 5 favourite SNES RPGs, both in terms of gameplay and music.
